descriptions: The student demonstrates no understanding of the safety rules for play or safety routines.
The student shows a minimal understanding of safety rules, often requiring reminders and corrections.
The student demonstrates a basic understanding of safety rules but occasionally needs prompting to follow them.
The student generally understands and follows safety rules with minor inconsistencies.
The student consistently understands and follows safety rules, demonstrating good awareness.
The student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of safety rules, proactively promoting safety and correcting others when necessary.
The student does not follow any safety routines.
The student inconsistently follows safety routines and needs constant supervision.
The student follows some safety routines but needs frequent reminders.
The student generally follows safety routines with occasional lapses.
The student consistently follows safety routines, demonstrating self-discipline.
The student meticulously follows all safety routines and encourages others to do the same, acting as a role model.
The student does not recognize or respond to unsafe situations.
The student rarely recognizes unsafe situations and does not know how to respond appropriately.
The student recognizes some unsafe situations but struggles to respond effectively.
The student usually recognizes unsafe situations and responds adequately.
The student consistently recognizes unsafe situations and responds appropriately, showing quick thinking.
The student anticipates and prevents unsafe situations, demonstrating exceptional awareness and responsibility.
